remarks: If a set of real functions from a common domain is closed under addition, multiplication and it contains constants, then it is closed under subtraction.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
statement:
stoweidlem33.1 $e |- F/_ t F $.
stoweidlem33.2 $e |- F/_ t G $.
stoweidlem33.3 $e |- F/ t ph $.
stoweidlem33.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ f e. A ) -> f : T --> RR ) $.
stoweidlem33.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ f e. A /\ g e. A ) -> ( t e. T |-> ( ( f ` t ) + ( g ` t ) ) ) e. A ) $.
stoweidlem33.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ f e. A /\ g e. A ) -> ( t e. T |-> ( ( f ` t ) x. ( g ` t ) ) ) e. A ) $.
stoweidlem33.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR ) -> ( t e. T |-> x ) e. A ) $.
stoweidlem33 $p |- ( ( ph /\ F e. A /\ G e. A ) -> ( t e. T |-> ( ( F ` t ) - ( G ` t ) ) ) e. A ) $.
